SMW Subobject for PickedImage: File:Marshy jungle vine (picked).pngObject ID: 2576Uses infobox: SceneryIs members only: trueIs variant of: Marshy jungle vine
SMW Subobject for RipeImage: File:Marshy jungle vine (ripe).pngObject ID: 2575Uses infobox: SceneryIs members only: trueIs variant of: Marshy jungle vine

Marshy jungle vine is a plant found in Karamja, 11 plants can be found growing south-west of Tai Bwo Wannai. It is the only place where players can obtain grimy snake weed (and subsequently its clean version) from, which is needed for some quests like Jungle Potion and Legends' Quest. Snake weed is also an ingredient in making Sanfew serum. The vines can only be searched after regrowing every 60 seconds. World hopping is not necessary as the time to complete a harvest lap, the first vine will have regrown.

They are located near the coast, just north of the Horned Graahk, near fairy ring code CKR. They are bright green in colour with yellow spikes around its vines.

Marshy jungle vines containing snake weed.

Harvest chance[edit | edit source]

The average time it takes to harvest a single snake weed decreases with higher herblore levels. At level 1 you have a 4% chance per roll, and at level 99 you have 86% chance.[1]

It is the only place where players can obtain [[grimy snake weed]] (and subsequently its [[Snake weed|clean version]]) from, which is needed for some quests like [[Jungle Potion]] and [[Legends' Quest]]. Snake weed is also an ingredient in making [[Sanfew serum]]. The vines can only be searched after regrowing every 60 seconds. World hopping is not necessary as the time to complete a harvest lap, the first vine will have regrown. They are located near the coast, just north of the Horned Graahk, near fairy ring code {{Fairycode|CKR}}. They are bright green in colour with yellow spikes around its vines.
